56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:Whenever we went up a place we would say, "Allahu--Akbar (i.e. Allah is Greater)", and whenever we went down a place we would say, "Subhan Allah

chapter.eng-name: Reciting Subhan Allah when going down a valley
